frozen.name: gnome-shell-extension-notifications-to-file
frozen.shortDescription: Notifications are appended to a file in $HOME/.notifications/ with one file created per day.
frozen.longDescription:
Notifications are appended to a file in $HOME/.notifications/ with one file created per day.
Entries show the following information:
Timestamp
Whether the banner was shown
The urgency
The title
Banner text
